Package org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.reporting.freemarker.filepath

Class GetPrettyPathForFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.reporting.freemarker.filepath.AbstractGetPrettyPathForFile
      • org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.reporting.freemarker.filepath.GetPrettyPathForFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModel, freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModelEx, freemarker.template.TemplateModel, WindupFreeMarkerMethod
    public class GetPrettyPathForFile
extends AbstractGetPrettyPathForFile
    Returns a pretty path for the provided file. If the File appears to represent a Java File, this will attempt to determine the associated Java Class and return the name formatted as a package and class (eg, com.package.Foo).

    Called as follows:

    getPrettyPathForFile(fileModel)

    Author:
    Jesse Sightler
